content: the slip_stitch over the seam the 3rd photo shows where to insert your hook to make the slip_stitch in the corners when you have made the last slip_stitch in the same ch2-space that you started in fasten_off with a darning needle work a st around the starting st as in the 1st photo below work away yarn ends the 3rd photo below shows the front panel with round 5 © tic-tac-toe egg game by yvonne van zijl @bokkyshome 2024 8 round 5 daisy attach yarn with a slip_stitch in the 1st double_crochet after any ch2-space of round 3 chain 1 this counts as a single_crochet 30 single_crochet chain 2 skip the next ch2-space 31 single_crochet x 3 chain 2 skip the next ch2-space close the round with an invisible join over the starting chain fasten_off 124 single_crochet 4 ch2-space back panel rose remember the stacked single_crochet counts as a double_crochet the chain 1 and single_crochet at the end of the round count as a ch2-space round 1 repeat round 1 of the small granny square 12 double_crochet 4 ch2-space round 2 1 stacked single_crochet double_crochet in the ch2-space below 3 double_crochet 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in the next ch2-space x 3 3 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in the next ch2-space this will be the ch2-space in which this round started chain 1 single_crochet in the top of the stacked single_crochet 28 double_crochet 4 ch2-space round 3 1 stacked single_crochet double_crochet in the ch2-space below 7 double_crochet 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in the next ch2-space x 3 7 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in the next ch2-space this will be the ch2-space in which this round started chain 1 single_crochet in the top of the stacked single_crochet 44 double_crochet 4 ch2-space round 4 1 stacked single_crochet double_crochet in the ch2-space below 11 double_crochet 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in the next ch2-space x 3 11 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in the next ch2-space chain 1 single_crochet in the top of the stacked single_crochet 60 double_crochet 4 ch2-space round 5 1 stacked single_crochet double_crochet in the ch2-space below skip the 1st double_crochet after the ch2-space 14 double_crochet 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in the next ch2-space x 3 skip the 1st double_crochet after the ch2-space 14 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in the next ch2-space chain 1 single_crochet in the top of the stacked single_crochet 72 double_crochet 4 ch2-space round 6 1 stacked single_crochet double_crochet in the ch2-space below 18 double_crochet 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in the next ch2-space x 3 18 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in the next ch2-space chain 1 single_crochet in the top of the stacked single_crochet 88 double_crochet 4 ch2-space round 7 1 stacked single_crochet double_crochet in the ch2-space below 22 double_crochet 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in the next ch2-space x 3 22
